message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40. This way we both benefit from ending the game quickly.
I think we can both do better than that. Let's split it 55/45 in my favor, since I'll be making the next offer if you reject this one.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a little less this time, 55 for me and 45 for you.  Time is running out and the value is decreasing!
